name: planted.filetwürfel
description: Premium plant-based steak pieces with intense umami flavor, juicy texture, and tender bite.
longDescription: Our planted.filetwürfel Classic are bite-sized pieces of pure satisfaction. With their intense umami flavor, juicy texture, and tender bite, they're incredibly versatile. Stir-fry them with vegetables and noodles, braise them in hearty stews, or add them to your favorite recipes for an instant protein boost.
ingredients: Water, soy protein, rapeseed oil, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or add to stews and let simmer. Perfect for Asian-style dishes, stroganoff, or grain bowls.
